body:
The topic says it all
Is there a way I can find out how many mons ive ever broken?
body_tagged:
The topic says it all
Is there a way I can find out how many mons ive ever broken?
title: How do I find out my monument count?

replies.body: Not quite sure if you can see your entire total. But check www.avicus.net/RemyleQuistiti     there you can at least see your monument total of the last month
replies.body_tagged: Not quite sure if you can see your entire total. But check www.avicus.net/RemyleQuistiti     there you can at least see your monument total of the last month

replies.body: You will have to add the "objectives" up for nebula on your profile. So you have broken 364 monuments.
replies.body_tagged: You will have to add the "objectives" up for nebula on your profile. So you have broken 364 monuments.
